name: Daniel J Carps
coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing in response to the opening for trimmers that I saw on craigslist. 

I have many years of experience in cultivation/harvest, an eye for detail and am a hardworking and reliable employee. I also have my Colorado Key Employee License. Included below is a copy of my resume. I look forward to hearing from you as soon as possible to arrange a time for an interview.


Thank you for your consideration,


Daniel Carps dcarps80@gmail.com

open availability
